entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.9°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
